comment.author: 63659938@N00
comment._content: It's a fun photo, but a kingfisher really? It looks to me like a Black-crowned Night Heron.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: EliotC: You're right. I checked with Jaap van Dijk, the expedition's resident bird expert, who says the bird is, indeed, a black-crowned night heron, not a kingfisher as the original title of this photo said. What makes the picture more interesting, according to Jaap, is that you rarely see these birds during the daytime -- and this photo was taken about noon. Thanks for the correction.  ~Mary
